job_description: Software QA Test Co-Op   - will be responsible for the end to end testing of our software by   using proven methodologies.   - you have created test plans and cases for product performance in   response to customer reported issues and defect tracking, triage and   reproduction   - write up detailed bugs with steps to reproduce   - have experience with API testing,   - UI testing from Web apps, iOS and AndroidThe big picture is end to end testing of a home sensor that communicates tothe cloud over wifi with presentation layers on a web app, iOS and Android.Quite the complex framework and definitely will require a candidate thatcan multitask.
job_requirements: Skill sets we're looking for   - Bug writing   - Agile methodologies   - experience with JIRA project management tool   - exposure to REST APIs, MySQL databaseNice to haves   - Embedded firmware testing   - UI or Web automationOpen To All Majors:No
